review: great purchase, I can watch Netfilx, Amazon Prime and listen to Pandora.

review: Our family loves it. Not only do we get more use out of our Amazon prime, everyone can see the movie and it costs about the same as a DVD player. The kids love seeing the videos of each other that I took on kindle.
author: melissa wade

review: Very happy with the Fire Stick, allows us to quickly access Prime, Netflix and Pandora.
author: Angie

review: This is such a great product for making a standard TV into a "smart TV,"

review: free prime amazon offer is miss leading

review: So love my fire stick! I get everything I want with this!

review: When it works it's ok. I have to reset the thing every time I want to use it

review: Cutting the cord was easy with this!  Love love love
